caption:
Table 6. Empirical entropy of the latent codes, estimated with a NN 
entropy estimator. For comparison, column N shows the entropy 
of a standard Normal in R d of corresponding latent dimension. In 
brackets is the ratio of the NN entropy to the entropy of an isotropic 
Gaussian fit to the latent codes. Ratios below 1 indicate that the 
latent codes are more clustered than a Gaussian, suggesting the low 
entropy for sMIM is not a simple consequence of down-scaling 
the latent codes.
